prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 55000); x=contfrac(exp(1)/2); for (n=1, 20000, write("b006083.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 10 2009(PARI) Vec(x*(1+2*x+x^2+2*x^3-x^4-3*x^6+x^8-x^10) / ((1-x)^2*(1+x)*(1-x+x^2)*(1+x+x^2)^2) + O(x^50)) \\ _Colin Barker_, May 16 2016
